verses.text: Have \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* upon me, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, according to thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w*: according unto the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thy tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* blot \w out|strong="H4229"\w* my \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*.
\w Wash|strong="H3526"\w* me \w throughly|strong="H7235"\w* from mine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* me from my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.
For I \w acknowledge|strong="H3045"\w* my \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*: and my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \add is\add* \w ever|strong="H8548"\w* before me.

Against thee, thee only, have I \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add this\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*: that thou mightest be \w justified|strong="H6663"\w* when thou \w speakest|strong="H1696"\w*, \add and\add* be \w clear|strong="H2135"\w* when thou \w judgest|strong="H8199"\w*.

Behold, I was \w shapen|strong="H2342"\w* in \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; and in \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* did my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w conceive|strong="H3179"\w* me.\f + \fr 51.5 \ft conceive…: Heb. warm me\f*

Behold, thou \w desirest|strong="H2654"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* in the inward \w parts|strong="H2910"\w*: and in the \w hidden|strong="H5640"\w* \add part\add* thou shalt make me to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

\w Purge|strong="H2398"\w* me with \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w*, and I shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*: \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* me, and I shall be \w whiter|strong="H3835"\w* than \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*.

Make me to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w joy|strong="H8342"\w* and \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*; \add that\add* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \add which\add* thou hast \w broken|strong="H1794"\w* may \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w*.
\w Hide|strong="H5641"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from my \w sins|strong="H2399"\w*, and blot \w out|strong="H4229"\w* all mine \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w Create|strong="H1254"\w* in me a \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and \w renew|strong="H2318"\w* a \w right|strong="H3559"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* me.\f + \fr 51.10 \ft right: or, constant\f*
Cast me not \w away|strong="H7993"\w* from thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*; and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* not thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* from me.

\w Restore|strong="H7725"\w* unto me the \w joy|strong="H8342"\w* of thy \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*; and \w uphold|strong="H5564"\w* me \add with thy\add* \w free|strong="H5081"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.
\add Then\add* will I \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* \w transgressors|strong="H6586"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*; and \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* shall be \w converted|strong="H7725"\w* unto thee.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me from \w bloodguiltiness|strong="H1818"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w*: \add and\add* my \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* shall sing \w aloud|strong="H7442"\w* of thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.\f + \fr 51.14 \ft bloodguiltiness: Heb. bloods\f*
O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w open|strong="H6605"\w* thou my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*; and my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* shall shew \w forth|strong="H5046"\w* thy \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.

For thou \w desirest|strong="H2654"\w* not \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*; else would I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add it:\add* thou \w delightest|strong="H7521"\w* not in burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.\f + \fr 51.16 \ft else…: or, that I should\f*

The \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add are\add* a \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*: a \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* and a \w contrite|strong="H1794"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou wilt not \w despise|strong="H0959"\w*.

Do \w good|strong="H3190"\w* in thy good \w pleasure|strong="H7522"\w* unto \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: \w build|strong="H1129"\w* thou the \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Then shalt thou be \w pleased|strong="H2654"\w* with the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, with burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and \w whole|strong="H3632"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*: then shall they \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w* upon thine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.
